text: kaise baaqee rah sakatee hai? jabaki unaka haal yah hai ki yadi ve tumhen daba paen to ve na tumhaare vishay mein kisee naate-rishte ka khayaal rakhen aur na kisee abhivachan ka. ve apane munh hee se tumhen raazee karate hai, kintu unake dil inakaar karate rahate hai aur unamen adhikatar avagyaakaaree hai
